projects.title: Hanoi Towers
projects.description: Demo HTML page for Medium article

projects.title: Chemical Words
projects.description: Simple web page to write words using chemical element cards, as shown in the periodic table. If necessary, fake symbols are generated to complete the words.

projects.title: My Résumé
projects.description: CV presented in several UI styles and PDF. It supersedes the old CV app made in 2018with the MEAN stack and discontinued in 2019 due to hosting issues.

projects.title: Arbol genealógico
projects.description: Family tree builder. Front end only SPA. The data for the family tree is supplied by hand in a custom format in a separate json file, which is later parsed by cytoscape and jQuery. This allows for multiple family trees.

projects.title: Spaced
projects.description: small project that aims to use the Spaced Repetition approach to memorization to help me learn French verbs and vocabulary.

projects.title: Media Cubana
projects.description: Free catalogue of Cuban movies and documentaries, hosted in Youtube, VK or other online resources. While it is not a comprehensive catalogue, the idea is for it to contain at least a reference to every movie or feature length documentary we can find, even if we don't actually have the actual media published. It does not contain much in the way of coding, rather being just a Google Site that pulls data from a Google sheet, hosts videos in VK and Youtube and presents them in an Awesome Table enabled HTML5 page.

projects.title: SIIPOL
projects.description: An ERP made for the CICPC, the scientific Venezuelan police. It's not publicly available outside CICPC's network. It was developed during my tenure in UCI, as part of a team of dozens of developers. I performed the roles of architect and support engineer level III from 2006 to 2012, at which time the project was transferred to the technology division of CICPC.

projects.title: Dfa
projects.description: Deterministic Finite Automata designed for String recognition but generic enough to recognize any kind of object sequence. It accepts callbacks and a memento object to keep track of transitions results. Used in the Facundia project

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: Catalogue application to keep track of all noteworthy programming efforts, however small. Projects here range from the professionally dedicated to the personally POCs made for training, educational or self improvement.

projects.title: Caribbean Online Judge
projects.description: My 2008 undergraduate thesis. The COJ eventually led to the creation of the Caribbean Region of the ACM-ICPC. I was involved as developer, architect, evangelist and support engineer from 2007 to 2010, and again from 2012 to 2015. The COJ stopped development in 2016, was publicly released on Github in 2018, and taken down in 2019.

projects.title: Facundia Demo
projects.description: Simple web app that uses Facundia for simple syntactic manipulations of words in Spanish. This is merely an UI demo for Facundia features.

projects.title: Facundia
projects.description: A library for simple word manipulations of Spanish words. This is a simple Java JAR containing rules and lists of language exceptions. It can be included in any Java app.

projects.title: Recipes list
projects.description: A simple static web site to gather cooking recipes we have made. It's purpose is simple organization of these recipes that we have forgotten a couple of times before, to prevent them for being forgotten again.

projects.title: Monty Hall
projects.description: A web demo for the classic problem of the three door selection. It was done as a resource for a corresponding Medium article.
